channel.title: The Garden of Chaos: Fantasy Strike Events
channel.description: Events happening in Fantasy Strike, compiled by the Garden of Chaos.

image.title: The Garden of Chaos: Fantasy Strike Events

item.title: Cyber Stun City Week 19
item.description:
Cyber Stun City week 19, hosted by TorontoTopTiers!

Wednesday the 22nd of July 2020 at 23:00 UTC / 00:00 BST / 16:00 PDT / 19:00 EDT

Bracket / Stream

item.title: Veiled Threat II
item.description:
(Description taken from the bracket details page.

Veiled Threat II

Coming off the heels of our first event, safety_man and MrMKL are back once again to bring you Veiled Threat II

The featured game is Fantasy Strike - available on PS4, PC/Steam and Nintendo Switch with full crossplay support.

Our goal once again is to highlight hidden talents within the community and uncover Veiled Threats that lurk just below the highest ranks, some of whom are fully capable of taking them out.

Dates & Times

The tournament will take place on Sunday August 2nd at 3PM EDT (GMT-4)

(Janet's time zone translation: 20:00 BST / 19:00 UTC / 12:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT)

item.title: TPK Weekly Fantasy Strike Tournament #35

item.title: AnimEVO (sorry about that last one)
item.description:
Registration link for the Fantasy Strike Tournament at AnimEVOnline is now live! Head over to https://smash.gg/tournament/animevo-2020/event/fantasy-strike/overview and sign up now.

Tournament is August 22nd, exact pool times are tentative but will most likely be around 3pm or 4pm Eastern.

(Announcement text copied from the Fantasy Strike discord server's announcement section, and this time I didn't accidentally break the HTML)

item.title: TPK Weekly Fantasy Strike Tournament #33 (Correction!)

item.title: Garden of Chaos Big Update Tournament
item.description:
A Garden of Chaos tournament to celebrate the big update, in the Teams style - one team will play the original characters of Fantasy Strike, one team will play the new ones!

To be held shortly after the big update (whenever that happens) at 20:00 UTC / 21:00 BST / 16:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT

Bracket / Stream

item.title: Garden of Chaos B
item.description:
The fifth weekly Garden of Chaos tournament, in the Oops, All Vals! style (a modification of Teams where all players use Valerie)!

To be held on Thursday the 25th of June 2020 at 20:00 UTC / 21:00 BST / 16:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT (yes, this has already happened as of this RSS feed being made, but ah well :D )
